newsitem.title: RUSSIA: SOCCER-ROTOR AND DYNAMO TAKE TOP SPOTS IN RUSSIA.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ROTOR AND DYNAMO TAKE TOP SPOTS IN RUSSIA.

text.p: Rotor Volgograd and Dynamo Moscow took advantage of Spartak Moscow's weekend off by moving above them into first and second place respectively in the Russian league on Saturday.
Rotor beat Krylya Sovietov 2-1 in Samara and Dynamo won 3-1 at Rostselmash Rostov to gain a two points advantage.
Oleg Veretennikov struck his 14th league goal of the season for Rotor and Oleg Terekhin his 11th for Dynamo.
Spartak, in European Cup action on Wednesday, were given permission to move their scheduled clash with Chernomorets to late September.
